Darwin’s theory of evolution was the result of his five years

on the Beagle, fighting the waves and infectious diseases.

If the complete theory of evolution is Darwin’s book The Origin of Species, then his voyage on the Beagle can be described as the prelude. That’s how important the trip turned out to be.

I have to be sure

and make detailed records of everything that happens from here on out.

Hello, seagulls!

Now that we’re surrounded by water on all four sides,

it really feels like

a sea voyage.

Could you

move

to the side

a bit?

Huh?

57
